p: Lin et al. [ 84] presented the efficient synthesis of α-pinene-based dithiadiazoles 92 by the cyclization reaction of α-pinene-based disubstituted phenyl acyl amino thioureas 91. The experiments showed that both compounds have weak herbicidal activity and the inhibition rates against fungi ( Brassica campestris L., Physalospora piricola) are moderate except for 2,2′-methyl-substituted derivatives. A better plant growth-regulating activity was observed for derivatives with halo groups as compared to the other functional groups ( Figure 21).
